images.name: Warriors defeat Lakers in Game 5 to stave off elimination
images.caption: The Warriors cruise to victory with all starters reaching double digits and force Game 6 against the Lakers.

articles.description: Draymond Green came out as Golden State's engine, and the Warriors beat the Lakers to stave off elimination.
articles.headline: Draymond Green sets tone as Warriors beat Lakers to stay alive

images.name: Josh Hart assessed a Flagrant 1 foul while guarding Jimmy Butler
images.caption: Josh Hart's foul is upgraded to a Flagrant 1 after he invaded Jimmy Butler's landing space on a 3-pointer.

articles.description: Everything you need to know about the NBA's Eastern and Western Conference semifinals is right here.
articles.headline: NBA playoffs 2023: Schedule, how to watch, scores, more

images.name: AD heads to locker room after taking elbow to head
images.caption: After Kevon Looney inadvertently elbows Anthony Davis, Davis heads to the locker room.

articles.description: Anthony Davis exited L.A.'s loss after being struck on the side of the head by Golden State's Kevon Looney.
articles.headline: Anthony Davis exits Lakers' loss to Warriors after hit to head

articles.description: Golden State Warriors (44-38, sixth in the Western Conference) vs. Los Angeles Lakers (43-39, seventh in the Western Conference)
articles.headline: Los Angeles tries to finish off series in game 6

articles.description: New York Knicks (47-35, fifth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Miami Heat (44-38, eighth in the Eastern Conference)
articles.headline: Miami looks to secure series in game 6

images.name: LeBron: Game 6 an opportunity for Lakers to show grit and resiliency
images.caption: LeBron James shares how the Lakers will respond in Game 6 against the Warriors and his hopes for a speedy recovery for Anthony Davis.

articles.description: LeBron James shares how the Lakers will respond in Game 6 against the Warriors and his hopes for a speedy recovery for Anthony Davis.
articles.headline: LeBron: Game 6 an opportunity for Lakers to show grit and resiliency
